plot: The king's mistress has an affair with a servant which results in a son, Ju-mang. The king despises the boy and banishes him to be raised in a temple. There, Ju-mang studies martial arts. ...
title: Sarangui dongmyeong wang
plot_es: The king's mistress has an affair with a servant which results in a son, Ju-mang. The king despises the boy and banishes him to be raised in a temple. There, Ju-mang studies martial arts. ...
plot_en: The king's mistress has an affair with a servant which results in a son, Ju-mang. The king despises the boy and banishes him to be raised in a temple. There, Ju-mang studies martial arts. ...
